oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Gospel Meeting at the Trinity Lane Church of Christ (with edits)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Meetings; Metal photoplates;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: One color lobby card (black on white) announcing a Gospel Meeting with sermons by Rufus Clifford at the Trinity Lane Church of Christ from March 27 through April 3. Poster features a metal photoplate of Rufus Clifford. Handwritten edits have been made to the poster: Rufus Clifford's name has been replaced with C. E. McGaughey, as well as his photo, and the dates have been updated to September 11 through 20.
